question: If <katex>$N_{2}$</katex> gas is bubbled through water at 293 K, how many moles of <katex>$N_{2}$</katex> gas would dissolve in 1 litre of water? Assume that <katex>$N_{2}$</katex> exerts a partial pressure of 0.987 bar.
[Given <katex>$K_{H}$</katex> for <katex>$N_{2}$</katex> at 293 K is 76.48 kbar]
